title: How to write a secret admirer letter - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello. My name is (your name here). This is a secret admirer letter from me, (your name here). But make sure you don’t tell (name of girl you like here) that I like her, because that would be really, really embarrassing and I’m not even sure if she likes me back. I’d really like to go out with her, but I don’t know how to approach her and ask her out, so I wrote this letter instead. I don’t really know why it’s written in the third person but whatever. So yeah. Sincerely, (your name here). Then you say “hey, someone gave me this letter for you” or something like that, and give her the letter.
you can check in this video how to write a secret message on a simple paper.
